```{r setup}
library(annoshiny)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
radon <- rstanarm::radon

p_radon <- ggplot(radon, aes(x = log_radon, y = log_uranium)) +
geom_point() 

af_radon <- function(plots, pointdf) {
    map(plots, ~. + geom_point(data = pointdf, color = 'red'))
}

AP_eff <- AnnoPlot$new(list(p_eff), df_eff, af_eff, annotype = "brush",
                   plot_dims = list(c(2, 3)))



sfp <- ggplot(sfdf, aes(x = p_n, y = sf)) + theme_bw() +
    labs(y = "1 - Shrinkage factor", x = "Borrower cluster size")
sfap <- AP_bg$new(sfp, geom_point, sfdf, plot_dims = list(c(1, 1.5)))
```
